input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product specification information.

Product specification:
ProSticker 306 (One) 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker

Product keywords:
Indoor/Outdoor decals 
Made with outdoor professional grade vinyl and UV resistant inks.
Contoured cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look.
Uniquely designed by our national award winning artist to look good on any colored background.
Can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc.
Instructions included for easy application. All orders ship the same or next business day.
Bulk Quantities and Custom Orders are our specialty.
 Be assured all of our sales are "Square & on the Level" Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Show your support and respect for the men and women who protect and serve with this unique "Thank You Blue" sticker! Available in 4" size, this indoor/outdoor decal is made with professional-grade vinyl and UV-resistant inks, ensuring it will withstand the elements. With its contoured cut to the shape of the image, this sticker has a clean and custom look that will look great on any smooth surface, including vehicles, laptops, windows, and tool boxes.
The sticker is designed to look good on any colored background and is uniquely created by our national award-winning artist. It is guaranteed to satisfy you, and with instructions included for easy application, all orders ship the same or next business day.
At ProSticker, we specialize in bulk quantities and custom orders, so if you're looking for something specific, please don't hesitate to contact us. We guarantee all of our sales are "Square & on the Level," so you can be assured of receiving a high-quality product.
input_text.Response B: This 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker is uniquely designed by our national award-winning artist to look good on any colored background. Made with outdoor professional-grade vinyl and UV resistant inks. All of our stickers are contour cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look. It can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc. Our indoor/outdoor decals are suitable for car windows, bumpers, laptops, walls, lockers, folders, and any other place you can think of. All of our stickers are "Square & on the Level". All orders ship the same or next business day.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
